abstract: BHP Billiton and Rio Tinto’s joint $116 billion iron-ore venture in Australia has stalled in the face of regulations, and is being reevaluated by executives of the two firms, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
snippet: BHP Billiton and Rio Tinto’s joint $116 billion iron-ore venture in Australia has stalled in the face of regulations, and is being reevaluated by executives of the two firms, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter...
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton and Rio Tinto’s joint $116 billion iron-ore venture in Australia has stalled in the face of regulations, and is being reevaluated by executives of the two firms, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: BHP and Rio Suspend Venture in Face of Regulations
